data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Kandahar, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kandahar, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Kandahar, Afghanistan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 222 believers in the state of Kandahar the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 222 believers in Kandahar, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, 0.1% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kandahar.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Kandahar a passion to plant another simple church.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kandahar, Afghanistan has a population of 1,399,600.

We estimate Kandahar has 222 people who might know Jesus, 44 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,399,334 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,304 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Kandahar, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
